explains: n. 光辉；发光；容光焕发
wordGroup: spectral radiance 光谱辐射（强度）；光谱辐射率

sentences.en: The dim bulb of the bedside lamp cast a soft radiance over his face.
sentences.cn: 床头灯微弱的灯光给他的脸上涂上了一层柔和的光辉。

sentences.en: She has the vigour and radiance of someone young enough to be her granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 她精力充沛、容光焕发，就像小到可以做她孙女的年轻人那样。

sentences.en: At night, these streets are brilliant with the pearly radiance of electricity.
sentences.cn: 夜里，电力珍珠般的光辉使这些街道一片明亮。
